abstract: The Chicago News Cooperative was founded in 2009 to compete online with The Tribune and The Sun-Times; its articles have appeared in regional editions of The New York Times.
snippet: The Chicago News Cooperative was founded in 2009 to compete online with The Tribune and The Sun-Times; its articles have appeared in regional editions of The New York Times.
lead_paragraph: The Chicago News Cooperative, a nonprofit news organization that provided news to The New York Times and tried to compete online with The Chicago Tribune and The Chicago Sun-Times, will suspend operations the week of Feb. 26, its editor, James O’Shea, said.

headline.main: News Nonprofit in Chicago to Suspend Operations

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: MacArthur, John D and Catherine T, Foundation
